charges.charge_description: 18:472 &; 2-PASSES COUNTERFEIT OBLIGATIONS OR SECURITIES; Attempting to utter and uttering counterfeited US Treasury Checks and Aiding and Abetting (1-8)

charges.charge_disposition: Thirty three (33) months on each of Counts 1 through 8 to run concurrently; sentence imposed in the instant offense shall run concurrent with the sentence previously imposed in case no. 5:97-CR-0097-01; three (3) years supervised release w/standard &; special conditions; $5,102.00 restitution; $100 special assessment for each of Counts 1 through 8 for a TOTAL SPECIAL ASSESSMENT of $800.00. (1-8)
